a.title: March 22, 2020: Tech Support, Genesis Access, etc,

div.a: March 22, 2020: Tech Support, Genesis Access, etc,

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: As advertised, the Robbinsville Board of Education will hold its monthly business meeting at Pond Road Middle School tomorrow evening, Wednesday, March 18th, beginning at 7:00 PM. However, due to state restrictions prohibiting gatherings of more than 50 people, as well as the most recent national guidelines limiting public gatherings to ten people, we request that members of the public

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: As a way to balance the desire of our public to participate in person yet mitigate potential health risks and remain compliance with the guidelines, we will utilize a virtual platform to host the meeting. Members of the public will have the option to listen in by phone or to log-in on their device. Please note that only those who log-in on their laptop or computer will be able to participate in public comment.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: During this meeting the Board will conduct essential business only including adoption of the preliminary budget for 2020-2021. It is important to note that it is our intent to be efficient and adhere to the 8:00 PM statewide curfew.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

br.span: We will forward log-in information and instructions for participation tomorrow. This information will also be posted on the district website.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);

a.span: The agenda and supporting documentation can be accessed here.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

br.span: As always, we thank you for your support and cooperation as we strive to meet the challenges that face us during this unprecedented time.

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.

The Robbinsville Community commits to ensure that all students are Robbinsville Ready: Resilient and Self-Directed Scholars, Effective Communicators, Informed and Involved Citizens, Collaborative Team Players, Emotionally Intelligent Learners, and Innovative Thinkers.
